mapper.select: select c.id as clip_id, c.ingest_id, i.title as `ingest_name`, c.team_id, t.name as `team_name`, c.folder_id, f.name as `folder_name`, c.a_metadata_id, a.* from clip c left join ingest i on i.id = c.ingest_id left join team t on t.id = c.team_id left join folder f on f.id = c.folder_id left join a_metadata a on a.id = c.a_metadata_id
